sourcesContent:
import React, { Component } from "react";
import "./style.css";
import { Form, Input, TextArea, Button, Message } from "semantic-ui-react";
import { IconContext } from "react-icons";
import { BiMailSend } from "react-icons/bi";
import { siteKey, secretKey } from "../../../private/recaptcha";
import ReCAPTCHA from "react-google-recaptcha";
const recaptchaRef = React.createRef();

class FormExampleCaptureValues extends Component {
  state = {
    name: "",
    email: "",
    message: "",
    submissionMessage: "Looking forward to chatting soon",
  };

  handleChange = (e, { name, value }) => this.setState({ [name]: value });

  handleSubmit = () => {
    const { name, email, message, submissionMessage } = this.state;
    var submission = submissionMessage + " " + name + "!";
    this.setState({ submissionMessage: submission });
    this.setState({
      email: "",
      name: "",
      message: "",
      submissionMessage: "Looking forward to chatting soon",
    });
    const recaptchaValue = recaptchaRef.current.getValue();
    console.log(recaptchaValue);
  };
  onChange = (value) => {
    console.log("Captcha value:", value);
  };

  componentDidMount

  render() {
    const { name, email, message, submissionMessage } = this.state;

    return (
      <Form
        autocomplete="on"
        onSubmit={this.handleSubmit}
        className="formF"
        inverted
      >
        <Form.Group widths="equal">
          <Form.Input
            placeholder="Name"
            name="name"
            value={name}
            onChange={this.handleChange}
          />
          <Form.Input
            placeholder="Email"
            name="email"
            value={email}
            onChange={this.handleChange}
          />
        </Form.Group>
        <Form.TextArea
          placeholder="Message"
          name="message"
          value={message}
          onChange={this.handleChange}
        />
        <ReCAPTCHA
          theme="dark"
          ref={recaptchaRef}
          sitekey={siteKey}
          onChange={this.onChange}
        />
        <Message success header="Submitted." content={submissionMessage} />
        <Form.Field control={Button}>
          <svg
            xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg"
            version="1.2"
            baseProfile="tiny"
            width="400px"
            height="500px"
            viewBox="0 0 400 500"
          >
            <defs>
              <mask id="letter-mask">
                <path
                  id="positive-mask"
                  fill="white"
                  stroke="white"
                  d="M251.56,136h-96.97c-4.43,0-8.02-3.59-8.02-8.02V10.02c0-4.43,3.59-8.02,8.02-8.02h96.97
	c4.43,0,8.02,3.59,8.02,8.02v117.97C259.58,132.41,255.99,136,251.56,136z"
                />
                <path
                  id="negative-mask"
                  fill="black"
                  stroke="black"
                  d="M135.99,414.9V225.65l36.27,24.95v-0.04c3.61-2.45,7.88-3.76,12.24-3.76h37.16
	c4.37,0,8.63,1.31,12.24,3.76v0.04l36.27-24.95V414.9H135.99z"
                />
              </mask>
            </defs>
            <g id="wind">
              <line
                x1="119"
                y1="215.37"
                x2="49"
                y2="215.37"
                stroke-dasharray="17,15,15,13"
              />
              <line
                x1="119"
                y1="231.34"
                x2="18"
                y2="231.34"
                stroke-dasharray="19,15,15,11"
              />
              <line
                x1="119"
                y1="247.3"
                x2="26"
                y2="247.3"
                stroke-dasharray="13,19,15,13"
              />
              <line
                x1="119"
                y1="263.26"
                x2="2"
                y2="263.26"
                stroke-dasharray="20,14,10,16"
              />
              <line
                x1="119"
                y1="279.23"
                x2="65"
                y2="279.23"
                stroke-dasharray="13,15,11,21"
              />
            </g>
            <g id="envelope">
              <path
                d="M262.09,288.8H144.12c-4.43,0-8.02-3.59-8.02-8.02v-66.97c0-4.43,3.59-8.02,8.02-8.02h58.98h58.98
		c4.43,0,8.02,3.59,8.02,8.02v66.97C270.11,285.21,266.52,288.8,262.09,288.8z"
              />
              <path d="M136.02,275.14l36.27-24.58c3.61-2.45,7.88-3.76,12.24-3.76h37.16c4.37,0,8.63,1.31,12.24,3.76l36.27,24.58" />
              <path d="M247.55,237.27" />
              <line x1="270.2" y1="225.65" x2="233.93" y2="250.6" />
              <line x1="172.28" y1="250.6" x2="136.02" y2="225.65" />
              <path
                id="lid"
                vector-effect="non-scaling-stroke"
                d="M270.2,213.39v7.01c0,3.36-1.76,6.56-4.82,8.71l-53.87,38.12c-4.86,3.44-11.95,3.44-16.82,0
		l-53.87-38.12c-3.05-2.16-4.82-5.35-4.82-8.71v-7.01"
              />
            </g>
            <g mask="url(#letter-mask)">
              <g id="letter">
                <path
                  d="M251.56,136h-96.97c-4.43,0-8.02-3.59-8.02-8.02V10.02c0-4.43,3.59-8.02,8.02-8.02h96.97
             c4.43,0,8.02,3.59,8.02,8.02v117.97C259.58,132.41,255.99,136,251.56,136z"
                />
                <g stroke-linecap="square" stroke-width="6" opacity="0.5">
                  <line x1="159.58" y1="22" x2="192.58" y2="22" />
                  <line x1="159.58" y1="35" x2="213.58" y2="35" />
                  <line x1="168.58" y1="49" x2="247.58" y2="49" />
                  <line x1="159.58" y1="63" x2="247.58" y2="63" />
                  <line x1="159.58" y1="77" x2="247.58" y2="77" />
                  <line x1="159.58" y1="90" x2="247.58" y2="90" />
                  <line x1="159.58" y1="104" x2="221.58" y2="104" />
                  <line x1="210.58" y1="118" x2="247.58" y2="118" />
                </g>
              </g>
            </g>
          </svg>
        </Form.Field>
      </Form>
    );
  }
}

export default FormExampleCaptureValues;
